rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh, hey.
Thinking of joining the vigilantes, are
you? Kidding, kidding!

rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Heard they caught Chairman Bahn
from the Avaritia Trade Guild.

rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0002
rows.name:
The Nopon merchants are all up in
arms about it. Looks like some of
them really looked up to him.

rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0003
rows.name:
Us vigilantes are on high alert making
sure the critters don't hike up the
prices and rip people off.

rows.label: tlk41300022_05_msg0004
rows.name:
It's hard work, but we'll manage.
I just pray that this is the end of
our troubles...
